abstract: Indian state of Goa is starting program to treat gay youths as problem and to counsel them to live heterosexual lives; homosexual relations in India are illegal.
lead_paragraph: The state of Goa in India, where homosexual relations are illegal, plans to treat teenagers who say they are gay, bisexual or transgender with programs that include counseling.

byline.original: By SUHASINI RAJ and NIDA NAJAR

snippet: The state of Goa in India, where homosexual relations are illegal, plans to treat teenagers who say they are gay, bisexual or transgender with programs that include counseling.

headline.main: State in India Plans to Help Gay Youth ‘Get Over Same-Sex Feelings’
headline.print_headline: State in India Plans to Help Gay Youth ‘Get Over Same-Sex Feelings’
